titleStmt.title: Animadversions and considerations upon a sheet, printed for Francis Smith containing a confession of the faith of several catapædobaptists, whose names are thereunto subscribed. As also the absurdities of the doctrine of arminianism, free-will, and general redemption; and that it is a popish doctrine; and their objections briefly answered. By J. H.
titleStmt.author: Humfrey, John, 1621-1719.
Humphreys, John, b. 1637.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for W. Marshal, at the Bible in Newgate-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Christ Church Library, Oxford.
